code: import React,{useState}from'react';import UserList from'./UserList';import UserForm from'./UserForm';import'./styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[currentUser,setCurrentUser]=useState(null);const addUser=user=>{setUsers([...users,user]);};const updateUser=updatedUser=>{const updatedUsers=users.map((user,index)=>index===currentUser.index?updatedUser:user);setUsers(updatedUsers);setCurrentUser(null);};const deleteUser=index=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this user?')){const updatedUsers=users.filter((_,i)=>i!==index);setUsers(updatedUsers);}};const handleSubmit=user=>{if(currentUser){updateUser(user);}else{addUser(user);}};const handleEdit=index=>{setCurrentUser({...users[index],index});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"User Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserForm,{onSubmit:handleSubmit,currentUser:currentUser,setCurrentUser:setCurrentUser}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserList,{users:users,onEdit:handleEdit,onDelete:deleteUser})]});};export default App;
